INSERT ALL
INTO MSSAPP.MC_CEVENT (CEVENT_ID, CEVENT_TYP_GRP_CDE, CEVENT_TYP_CDE, EVNT_REF_NUM, EVNT_NAM, CEVENT_STAT_CDE, MRKT_ID, INSTR_ID, CCASS_ANNOUNCEMENT_NUM, SHOLD_DATE, CUTOFF_DATE, AUTH_DATE, REPLY_DEADLINE_DATE, NOMINEE_LETR_IND, IS_ALERT_AFTR_ACTN, IS_ALERT_AFTR_DEADLINE, REMRK, LETR_REMRK, IS_SHOLD_CAPTURED, IS_NOTF_SENT, IS_PEND_ACTIVATE, IS_PROCESSED, CMPLT_DATE, ACTIVATION_DATE, ACT_CUTOFF_DATE, REV_CUTOFF_DATE, REV_AUTH_DATE, REV_CMPLT_DATE, CANL_DATE, CUTOFF_REV_CNT, AUTH_REV_CNT, EXCH_RATE_UPD_CNT, CMPNY_CDE, EXCESS_ALOT_CNT, RCALC_CHRG_CNT, REC_VER_NUM, INIT_TIME, LAST_UPD_TIME, LAST_UPD_BY, TAG_SEQ, IS_PRCES, IS_SHOLD_AMENDED, IS_ENOTF, CEVENT_CREAT_TYP_CDE, EXTERNAL_CREAT_ID, TREAT_GRP_CDE, DEF_TAX_RATE, IS_OTCR_TXN, IS_STAMP_DUTY_CHRG, OTCR_RPT_ON_STG_CDE) VALUES (#{item.ceventId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.ceventTypGrpCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ceventTypCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.evntRefNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.evntNam,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ceventStatCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.mrktId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.instrId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.ccassAnnouncementNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sholdDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.cutoffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.authDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.replyDeadlineDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.nomineeLetrInd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isAlertAftrActn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isAlertAftrDeadline,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.remrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.letrRemrk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isSholdCaptured,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isNotfSent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isPendActivate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isProcessed,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.cmpltDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.activationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.actCutoffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.revCutoffDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.revAuthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.revCmpltDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.canlDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.cutoffRevCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.authRevCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.exchRateUpdCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.cmpnyCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.excessAlotCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.rcalcChrgCnt,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.recVerNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.initTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.lastUpdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.tagSeq,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.isPrces,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isSholdAmended,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.isEnotf,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.ceventCreatTypCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.externalCreatId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.treatGrpCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.defTaxRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{item.isOtcrTxn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NVL(#{item.isStampDutyChrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'N'), #{item.otcrRptOnStgCde,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
